attributes.action: Require the CSA to assess the parent with care as well as the non-resident parent and evaluate the effect on the child
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I had a clean break settlement and paid my ex wife £100k + pension rights, extended mortgage to facilitate.She earns approx £30k pa.Daughter lives with ex in 3 bed house facilitated by clean break,and visits me regularly for meals,but stays on avg once or twice a week.Son,17,not in education or work,so not counted as being supported by me.CSA now enforcing payments of £295 a month which will cause severe financial hardship and debt,make supporting both children virtually impossible and cause stress within the family.CSA take no account of ex finances,clean break or support for son and effect on daughter.

rejection.details: We suggest you remove the personal detail from your petition before resubmitting.
reasons: Material which is potentially confidential, commercially sensitive, or which may cause personal distress or loss
